nodes.text: Benetage was a planet within the Outer Rim Territories of the galaxy.

The Outer Rim planet of Benetage was an inhabited world during the eras before the rise of the Galactic Republic. A government existed on the world, wherein officials took on the title of Magistrate. The symbol of office of the Magistrates was the Crown of Verity, a Force artifact which caused its wearer to become a paragon of truth. The planet was depopulated mysteriously circa 30,000 BBY, and the Crown fell into obscurity until it turned up in the Archives of the Jedi Temple on Coruscant.
